r.d: The PEAR package contains: * the PEAR base class * the PEAR_Error error handling mechanism * the PEAR installer, for creating, distributing and installing packages
r.n: * fixed "info" shortcut (conflicted with "install") * added "php_bin" config parameter * all "non-personal" config parameters now use environment variables for defaults (very useful to override the default php_dir on Windows!)
